p.span: Your Case No {!Case.CaseNumber} has been updated to Closed.
Please direct any further request or inquiries about this case by emailing Network Partners Query Management and Support team on 'businesspartner@auspost.com.au'
Include your closed case number in the subject line of your request or enquiry if it is regarding the same issue.
We would endeavour to come back to you within 48 hours.
